title: Trolls in champion select-Punishment
body:
this issue needs to be addressed, i am now awaiting a 30min ban and lost 10 lp, not to mention the 5 min ban and 3 lp i have already given up. there needs to be some sort of report system involved in the champion select or at least a forfeit style vote as a way to avoid and punish these trolls. the current system is so broken its crippling the game, players like myself are left with a choice, lose 20lp and waste 20-40 minutes or dodge in champ select suffer bans and lp loss, meanwhile the little F#*khead who trolled for whatever reason will que straight back up and go on unpunished and continue to troll forcing others into the same position as myself.
please riot do something to address this issue, because players like myself, are getting fed up with being punished for others.

replies.body: So weird. I just made a post about this with pictures as well.
See, and if we get to say report someone right there in champion select, people could use that if they don't get their roll or if their pick is offmeta and 2spooky
yeah lets implement something that monitors every second of every champ select to depict if someone is "trolling"
